flavor: “Except for the dying part, having cancer is a piece of cake compared to getting rid of it.”
name: Chemotherapy
text:
Change to alter-ego form. Choose:
Exhaust Jane Foster and Medical Clinic → remove Chemotherapy from the game.
Discard 2 cards from your hand or take 2 damage. Discard this obligation.

name: War of the Realms
text: Malekith's scheming and manipulation has brought war to all of the known realms. His armies must be defeated, but there will be many casualties. When Revealed: Each player takes 1 indirect damage for each character they control. [hazard]

name: Malekith
text: [star] Forced Response: After Malekith activates, each player takes 1 indirect damage. (Thor's nemesis minion.)
flavor: “Welcome to the War of the Realms, you fools. And know... your bleeding has scarcely begun.”

name: War Witches
text: [star] Forced Interrupt: When War Witches would attack, they scheme instead. Forced Response: After threat is placed on the main scheme, the engaged player takes 1 indirect damage.
flavor: “We smell the darkness in your soul... and we will turn it into fire!”

name: Execute
text: When Revealed: Defeat the ally in play with the highest remaining hit points. If no ally was defeated this way, this card gains surge.

name: Hostile Takeover
text: When Revealed: Choose to either discard the support you control with the highest cost or take damage equal to its cost (this damage ignores tough status cards). If no support was discarded and no damage was taken this way, this card gains surge.
